title: Technology Fit Analysis for Improving Online Learning Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and online learning platform usage experience
context.additional_context: Analysis of relationships between technological suitability and satisfaction in mathematics learning within smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can understand the Online Learning Technology-Tool Fit (TTF) model and apply it to mathematical problems.
Learners can analyze their technology usage intentions by utilizing the UTAUT (Unified Theory of Acceptance and Use of Technology) framework.
Learners can explain how to measure factors affecting online learning satisfaction using quantitative survey tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
